name: Cat Mamoru
description:
Play as a Mamoru - future warrior of Neko Land and defeat the enimes.

--------

wasd/arrows  to move

RMouse - to attack

"p" - to go to main menu

"e" - to interact

Hi! This is my first game i've ever created:) I've done everything by myself(except some lines of code) It's short and has some basic mechanics but i'm still proud of it.

Enjoy!
